creator: tantaioana@yahoo.com
text:
1. Made the same request but with different headers so the request is sent to different versions of the same product
  -for one version the response is displayed 
  -for the second nothing appears even if the response code/message are 200/ok

Seams that the response can't be read by jmeter even if it's requested in different formats xml, json.. plain

Response

Response headers:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Application: OK;
Content-Length: 286
Server: server


HTTPSampleResult fields:
ContentType: 
DataEncoding: null


NOTE:1. using fiddler for the same request the result is displayed and no issues seams to appear
     2.  listener used: View results tree
         sampler: Http request HttpClient
         config element: Http header manager
